events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because the size does not fit me at all.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for returning the product and getting their money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah Thompson to handle the refund request.
Hello, thank you for reaching out to us. I understand you would like to request a refund for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in the original packaging for the refund process?
The order number is 4589321. Yes, the jacket is brand new, never worn, and still in the original packaging.
Thank you for the information. We can initiate the refund once you ship the jacket back. I will email you a prepaid return label shortly.
That sounds great, I appreciate your quick help and look forward to receiving the return label via email.
The prepaid return label has been sent to your email. After we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed promptly.
We wanted to check in to see if you have shipped the jacket and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
I have shipped the jacket yesterday using the return label. Please let me know when you receive it.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount has been credited back to your original payment method.
Your refund case is now closed. Thank you for shopping with us, and please reach out if you require any further assistance.
